presentation.presentationText2: I'm a Bachelor's student in Information Systems and Systems Analyst.
presentation.presentationText3: I live in Concepción del Uruguay, Entre Ríos, Argentina.

aboutMe.text1: I'm interested in Web Development and Object-Oriented Programming.
aboutMe.text2: I have great ability to adapt to any type of environment and always strive to improve. I'm characterized by my ability to work in a team and my enthusiasm for learning and developing my skills.
aboutMe.text3: I'm looking for a job opportunity in which I can acquire more experience, while continuing with my studies with the goal of growing personally and professionally.

uader.title: Bachelor of Information Systems
uader.text: In progress - Universidad Autónoma de Entre Ríos
